Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

params.parentId: The id of parent token, if it's zero, it means minted `tokenId` is a root token.
params.tokenId: The id of minted token, required to be greater than zero

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

childOfParentByIndex(uint256,uint256).details: If `parentId` is zero, it means get root token.

returns._0: The token ID at `index` of all chlidren tokens under `parentId` token.

childrenCountOf(uint256).details: If `parentId` is zero, it means get total amount of root tokens.

returns._0: The total amount of children tokens under `parentId` token.

indexInChildrenEnumeration(uint256,uint2.details: Throws if the `tokenId` is not found in the children enumeration. If `parentId` is zero, means get root token index.

params.tokenId: The specified token to be found

returns._0: The index position of `tokenId` found in the children enumeration

params.tokenId: The token want to be checked

returns._0: Return `true` if it is a leaf token; if not, return `false`

params.tokenId: The token want to be checked

returns._0: Return `true` if it is a root token; if not, return `false`

tokenByIndex(uint256).details: Returns a token ID at a given `index` of all the tokens stored by the contract. Use along with {totalSupply} to enumerate all tokens.

tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256).details: Returns a token ID owned by `owner` at a given `index` of its token list. Use along with {balanceOf} to enumerate all of ``owner``'s tokens.

totalSupply().details: Returns the total amount of tokens stored by the contract.

Minted(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when `tokenId` token under `parentId` is minted.

childOfParentByIndex(uint256,uint256).notice: Get the token at the specified index of all children tokens under `parentId` token.

childrenCountOf(uint256).notice: Get total amount of children tokens under `parentId` token.

childrenOf(uint256).notice: Get the children tokens of `tokenId` token.

indexInChildrenEnumeration(uint256,uint2.notice: Get the index position of specified token in the children enumeration under specified parent token.

isLeaf(uint256).notice: Check the `tokenId` token if it is a leaf token.

isRoot(uint256).notice: Check the `tokenId` token if it is a root token.

parentOf(uint256).notice: Get the parent token of `tokenId` token.
